channel.title: Some Quick Easy Questions About 508, Please Post
channel.description:
Okay, I Did ALOT Of Coding For 317, So Im Pretty Good At Them, But Then I Decided To Go Ahead With A 508, Less BullSh** Of Add New Models, And Coding All The Specs, You Get The Point, So I Have Some Questions, Fairly Easy Once You Know Them, So Please Leave Your Posts If You Have Any Knolege Of Them.
[s] This Means DO Know *What/Were/How* This Is *Does/Located/Works* =] [/s]
[b]1.[/b] Were Are Dialogs Stored, Like What File.
[b]2.[/b] [s]Were Are Commands Stored.[/s]
[b]3.[/b] [s]Were Is Autospawn Stored.[/s]
[b]4.[/b] [s]Were Is Npcdrops Stored.[/s]
[b]5.[/b] How To [b][i][u]CREATE[/u][/i][/b] A Shop.
Also Any Other Help WILL Be Excepted :P =]

item.title: Some Quick Easy Questions About 508, Please Post
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. They arent stored anywhere, but most of them are in NPCOption1.java

  2. Really depends on source.

Read full topic
